successes.title: RiffTrax Wants to Riff TWILIGHT Live in Theaters Nationwide!
successes.description: Help the RiffTrax/MST3K guys get TWILIGHT to riff for their next nationwide simulcast live show!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU PAGE. Your personal name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com! AND the satisfaction that you helped give TWILIGHT the riffing it deserves.

MR. B. NATURAL SHORT. Digital download of classic Mystery Science Theater 3000 short film MISTER B NATURAL, completely re-riffed with all new jokes!   Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!

NORMAN SHORT.  Digital download of never-before-riffed short featuring the infamous "Norman" of previous RiffTrax Live shows! In this origin myth NORMAN KRASNER, Norman struggles to use a men's room stall! (<-- This is completely true.)  Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!

OLDEST SHORT FILM EVER RIFFED!  Digital download of new riff for Georges Méliès' 1902 classic, A TRIP TO THE MOON! (Y'know, the one featured in HUGO and that Smashing Pumpkins video?) Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!

SHORTS COLLECTION. All of the previous three new RiffTrax shorts: MR. B. NATURAL, NORMAN KRASNER, and A TRIP TO THE MOON! Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!
SHORTS COLLECTION PLUS ONE. All of previous rewards plus a certificate for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue. SUPREME VALUE!!!

RIFFTRAX LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD!  Digital download of the entire August 2013 Live show that this here Kickstarter is about on the Digital Release Date (approximately 60 days after the Live Show.)  Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com.

RIFFTRAX LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD + VIDEO THANK-YOU.  Download of the August 2013 live show on the Digital Release Date, like in $20.00 reward. PLUS your personal name personally thanked not only on a thank-you page, but a thank-you VIDEO where Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett thank everyone personally by name, with personal thanks!

RIFFTRAX LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD + SHORTS PACKAGE. Digital download of the August 2013 live show on the Digital Release Date (approximately 60 days after the Fathom event.) PLUS new RiffTrax shorts MR. B. NATURAL; NORMAN KRASNER; A TRIP TO THE MOON. And both previous thank-you extras, including the video thank-you!

RIFFTRAX LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD + SHORTS PACKAGE + EXTRA FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX OF YOUR CHOICE. Digital download of the August 2013 live show, PLUS new RiffTrax shorts MR. B. NATURAL; NORMAN KRASNER; A TRIP TO THE MOON. PLUS  a certificate good for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue. And both previous thank-you extras, including the video thank-you!
THE FULL PACKAGE, ONE WEEK EARLY. Everything in the $35.00 reward package PLUS: you get it one week before the digital release date, with a bonus introduction by Mike, Kevin and Bill!

THE FULL PACKAGE, ONE WEEK EARLY + DIGITAL GOODIE PACK!  Everything in the $40.00 reward package plus a digital goodie pack.  Includes digital signed copy of rehearsal script, digital live show avatars from artist Len Peralta, digital signed thank-you photo from Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy, and Bill Corbett.

INVITATION TO OUR PLANNING SESSION.  Everything in the $50.00 reward package plus... an exclusive access code for an online planning session / rehearsal for the Live Show. A glimpse behind the curtain, if you dare.  [NOTE: Most features of this reward would come post-show in November 2013, but the planning session would be available in early August, before the live show]

INVITATION TO OUR PLANNING SESSION + SIGNED RIFFTRAX POSTER. Everything in the $60.00 reward package plus... A full-sized poster from one of our Fathom Events live shows, signed by Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett.
YOUR NAME ONSCREEN. Everything in the $75.00 rewards package plus: YOUR name in the credits at the end of the RiffTrax Live show in August!  Immortality is yours.

YOUR NAME ONSCREEN + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT.  Everything in the $100 rewards package plus... RiffTrax Kickstarter Commemorative T-Shirt designed by artist Adam Koford, who draws stuff for Disney and also created our three-man cartoon logo! This T-Shirt will not be available anywhere else.
YOUR FACE ONSCREEN.  Everything in the $100 rewards package plus... your name AND PHOTO at the end of the RiffTrax Live show in August. So much YOU!
NEW REWARD LEVEL!
YOUR FACE ONSCREEN II. Everything in the $100 rewards package plus... your name AND PHOTO in the pre-show slides before the RiffTrax Live show in August. So much YOU!
YOUR FACE ONSCREEN + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT.  All of the $100 rewards plus: your name AND PHOTO at the end of the RiffTrax Live show in August, plus RiffTrax Kickstarter Commemorative T-Shirt!
NEW REWARD LEVEL!

YOUR FACE ONSCREEN + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT II. All of the $100 rewards plus: your name AND PHOTO in the pre-show slides before the RiffTrax Live show in August, plus RiffTrax Kickstarter Commemorative T-Shirt!
PERSONALIZED SONG!  Everything in the $225 rewards package plus: Mr. Kevin Murphy will write / produce / deliver a personalized one-minute+ song, commissioned by you!
GET THE SCRIPTS FROM THE SHOW! Everything in the $225 rewards package plus: the actual scripts used by Mike, Kevin and Bill during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
